title: Watch Wawrinka face Coric on FREE Challenger TV
description: Stan Wawrinka and Borna Coric have met on big stages, including an ATP 250 final and at two ATP Masters 1000 events. On Sunday, the three-time major champion Wawrinka and former No. 12 will meet in a blockbuster championship match at the Open Aix Provence Crédit Agricole, an ATP Challenger 175 event in France. The 40-year-old Swiss is aiming to become the oldest Challenger champion in history while Coric seeks a season-leading fourth trophy at that level.  Wawrinka has won four of his five meetings with the Croatian, including an encounter just five weeks ago at the Naples Challenger, where Wawrinka ended Coric's 16-match winning streak. Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost. The clay-court final begins not before 2:20 p.m. local time. Watch Stan Wawrinka vs. Borna Coric (not before 2:20 p.m. local time) [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Stan Wawrinka will compete in the Open Aix Provence Crédit Agricole semi-finals Saturday, when he faces Borna Gojo at the ATP Challenger 175 event in France. Watch on ATP Challenger TV.

html:
Challenger

The 40-year-old Wawrinka bids to become oldest Challenger champion in history

May 03, 2025

Nicolas Averty

Stan Wawrinka and Borna Coric will meet for the second time at ATP Challenger Tour level this season. By ATP Staff

Stan Wawrinka and Borna Coric have met on big stages, including an ATP 250 final and at two ATP Masters 1000 events. On Sunday, the three-time major champion Wawrinka and former No. 12 will meet in a blockbuster championship match at the Open Aix Provence Crédit Agricole, an ATP Challenger 175 event in France.

The 40-year-old Swiss is aiming to become the oldest Challenger champion in history while Coric seeks a season-leading fourth trophy at that level.  Wawrinka has won four of his five meetings with the Croatian, including an encounter just five weeks ago at the Naples Challenger, where Wawrinka ended Coric's 16-match winning streak.

Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost. The clay-court final begins not before 2:20 p.m. local time.

Watch Stan Wawrinka vs. Borna Coric (not before 2:20 p.m. local time)
